name: Sneak Attack
description: +1 to damage if the user's dexterity is higher than the target's.

name: Poison
description: Deals increasing damage +1 over time, starting from the second turn.

name: Action Surge
description: Deals double weapon damage on the first turn.

name: Shield
description: -3 to incoming damage if the user's strength is higher than the attacker's.

name: Rage
description: +2 to damage for the first 3 turns, then -1 damage afterwards.

name: Stone Skin
description: Reduces incoming damage by the user's endurance value.

name: Vulnerability to Bludgeoning
description: Takes double damage from Bludgeoning weapons.

name: Immunity to Slashing
description: Slashing weapons deal no base damage (bonuses from abilities and attributes still apply).

name: Fire Breath
description: Every 3rd turn, breathes fire for an additional 3 damage.
